závěr: nejspíše konečný díl úžasné herní série Half Life 2,  Half Life 2: Episode two je zajímavý akorát krátký, ale jedna věc mě opravdu zaskočila, Alyx za mě konečně něco udělala a to donesla svému otci čaj, hra obsahuje nějaké bugy, ale to zase nahrazují jinačí věci, nepřátelé jsou úplně jinačí, ale základní jsou zde stále, akorát konec mě opravdu sklamal a je mi z něj smutno, čekal sem něco jinačího než tohle, prostě HL 2 je plný zvratů, celá tahle série byla úžasná a děkuji Valvu za vytvoření téhle skvělé hry a doufám že bude i další díl HL 2, ale počkat Half Life 2 má celkem 3 placenné části a to : HL 2, HL 2: Episode 1 a HL 2: Episode 2...........HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRMED :D

Half-Life2: Episódio 2 tem motivos de sobra para ter a fama que tem: Excelente FPS, enredo pra te deixar maluco, além de um gancho no final que vai fazer você gritar na frente da tela, como costuma acontecer em "Seasons Finales" dos seriados americanos. E sim, é altamente recomendável que você tenha jogado todos os jogos da série anteriormente.

Neste episódio, Alyx e Gordon conseguem fugir em segurança da Cidade 17, porém com a destruição da cidade, os Combines perderam o controle direto na humanidade, mas ao mesmo tempo, estão preparando um contra-ataque que poderá significar o fim de qualquer esperança. O jogo continua trazendo ótimas interações com a sidekick Alyx, além de alguns outros personagens que te acompanharão co mais frequência nessa jornada. O jogo é maior do que o episódio anterior, mas ainda assim, menor do que os jogos HL e HL2, porém, há algo aqui que não houve em nenhum outro jogo da série: Sendo este dividido em 7 capítulos, a cada transição acontece um grande evento que te deixará com os olhos grudados na tela e paralisado. Mas no fim das contas, o game termina com mais perguntas do que respostas, infelizmente.

No que diz respeito à qualidade técnica, não tem muito que adicionar além dos games anteriores: mesmas armas, um pequeno aperfeiçoamento nos gráficos, ótima trilha sonora que sobe nos momentos mais empolgantes, e os mesmos inimigos.

Na verdade, existem novos cenários como minas, cavernas subterrâneas e florestas, além do retorno do carro. Além disso, há alguns poucos novos inimigos: Antilions cuspidores de ácido, e os terríveis Hunters. O jogo é repleto de ação do começo ao fim, e, diga-se de passagem, que a batalha final é simplesmente frenética e um tanto desafiadora.

Sendo assim, Half-Life 2: Episode 2 é um excelente game, e particularmente o meu favorito. A duração ainda meio curta e as repetições de inimigos e armas até podem ser desvantagens, mas ao olhar o saldo final, o que temos é mais um game no jogo do gênero imortalizado pela Valve.

Agora é esperar pelo Gaben criar vergonha na cara e lançar o Episódio 3, ou o que muitos especulam, Half-Life 3.
Half Life 3 is 100% Confirmed , don't worry guys!

Half Life 2: Episode Two je docela rozdílná hra oproti předchozímu dílu (nečekaně episode one).
Zatímco první episoda byla taková krátká dvouhodinková záležitost, episoda 2 je skoro nová hra.
Source engine byl vylepšen takže hra vypadá lépe (btw... na téhle verzi Source enginu běží většina novějších her od Valve), hratelnost odpovídá zhruba 10 hodinám (což je na fps hru dneska docela slušné), obsah úrovní je rozmanější takže se nebudete nudit a především super příběh, který tu nehodlám moc rozebírat ale když opomeneme jednu geografickou anomálii tak začíná v okamžik kdy končí episode one.

+ solidní grafické zpracování
+ kvalitní příběh
+ vcelku dlouhá hratelnost bez stereotypu
+ dobré OST
+ velká změna v prostředí (z depresivního city 17 se přemístíte do přírody)
= stále stejné zbraně jako minule
- v autě chybí držák na kafé/trpajzlíka :)
- otevřený konec... 

Když to shrneme... Half Life 2: Episode Two je výborná hra, v roce 2007 se dokazala prosadit i mezi titány jako Crysis, Mass Effect, Assassins Creed či Bioshock. Jenom je škoda že se dalšího Half-Life už nedočkáme... Možná nastal čas se na to čekání už vybodnout, tato série je mrtvá...

Eight Fucking Years...
It's been Eight Years now since the best game in the world left us with the biggest cliffhanger in the world...

I loved the original Half-Life, had to wait 10 years to play all of Half-Life 2, and was sorely disappointed. As a note, I played the entirety of Half-Life 2 through from the beginning and am reviewing the entirety of the series here, not just Episode 2.

Right out of the gate, you're on guard duty. I hate escort missions. You spend the whole game with Alyx Vance three feet behind you, causing me to wish I could shoot her, and whenever you try, you end up with much the same results as Resident Evil 4. Mainly my annoyance with Alyx came whenever I tried to move a bunch of barrels and crates to create make-shift barriers. She just gets in the way and constantly knocks the object you're holding out of your hands. At least in Resident Evil 4 you could tell Ashley Graham to get out of your face and go hide in a steel trunk. Next, I don't understand first-person shooters that end in a final challenge which involves DRIVING (I.E. Halo & Halo 3). Finally, if you actually manage to make it past the last driving segment, you're treated to an even more poorly written end-game scenario than Blue-Shift, made even worse by the fact that it doesn't look like we'll ever get Half-Life 3, or even Episode 3. And no, I don't mean the cliff-hanger ending; all Half-Life entries end on a cliff-hanger. I could see that coming from a parallel universe away. No, the game-play ITSELF is unsatisfying in the final level. Oh well, at least we have Black Mesa now and I can hope for a remake of Opposing Force.

This is my theory on why we don't have Half Life 3 yet.

This game is a part of a trilogy, the Half Life 2 trilogy

Half Life 2 was the obvious first release, It came out in 2004

Half Life 2 Episode one was the 2nd release, It came out in 2006

Half Life 2 Episode 2 is the 3RD RELEASE! It came out in 2007

So we won't get Half Life 3, because Half Life 2 episode 2 is ACTUALLY Half Life 3!

Great episode, but now we wait. Episode 2 was a great segment in the Half Life series and did a great job raising my hopes that Gordon and Alex were saving the day for good this time. But of course not, that would be too easier for our heroes. The game has left me with a bunch of unanswered questions: what’s with Gman? Why did he save Alex so long ago? What’s her role in all of this? What did the vortigaunts mean? How old is Gordon or is this going to be a kinda-weird-big-age-gap-but-no-one-says-anything-about-it-because-humans-are-slim-pickings relationship with Alex? Why do the Advisors look like flying potatoes? But I am patient… I can wait…

Gameplay is great as per usual. Driving the car around in parts of the game is great, absolutely loved running over Zombines particularly. The achievements are definitely challenging though not hard. I teared up a bit when I had to load my little Gnomeo into the rocket. But with dedication you can get them all. 

10/10
Thank you Valve

Still waiting for the Episode 3.

After nearly 9 years. That should say enough.

At first when I completed the game I felt really pissed. If you look at the store page: Half-Life® 2: Episode Two is the second in a trilogy of new games created by Valve that extends the award-winning and best-selling Half-Life® adventure. Yet 8 years after its release, neither HL2:E3 nor HL3 was announced and this just leaves us at a cliffhanger..... forever. There were things mentioned in HL2:E2 which were meant to be the main objective in the next installment and also characters who were undeveloped, such as G-man. And now, after a few hours, I'm actually sad. I enjoyed the Half Life series too much to let it end like this.

As for the review proper, HL2:E2 continues shortly after the series of events in E1. Its gameplay is nearly the same as in E1 but with a much more interesting finale. It has the same, awesome voice acting, weapons, and also addressed the one negative I had for E1: Freeman gets his crowbar much earlier in the game! :)

The game length is roughly 5 hours, where as HL, HL2 and HL2:E1 took me 14, 14 and 4 hours respectively. This is rather pricey and I definitely recommend getting The Orange Box for a better deal.

3/3. Half-Life 3 confirmed.

In Half-Life 2: Episode Two Alyx and Gordon are being tracked down by the Combine, because of the data Alyx carries with her from when she left the citadel in Half-Life 2: Episode One. With this intel they can close the portal the destruction of the citadel created, and save the Earth from another attack. Overall Half-Life 2: Episode Two is visually stunning for its time, and positions the player in an all new environment making it all the better.

Like the other games in the Half-Life 2 Trilogy, this game was very good. The story continued as being consistantly good. This game was rather harder than previous parts of HL2, but that is part of the challenge in this game. Now that the Half-Life series is most likely over, I really liked this game because I enjoy games like this. I find First Person Shooters, with a story like Half-Life did. The ending, don't worry there are not any spoilers ahead, The ending...oh my...you hopefully brought some tissues to your computer. The ending will move you in unexpected ways. If you haven't purchased HL2, and HL2EP1, and are considering buying this one, it's worth it. This series is amazing. This is what Valve is known for. I assure you that this game is going to be one of your All-Time favorites.

My favorite of the Half-life 2 series of games. The game is alot shorter than any other I THINK. Not sure if it is though. But it's as long as it needs to be. It makes you do things not to slap on an hour of gameplay but to progress the story. So yeah, you can beat it in an hour, but thats all the time it needs. The enviroment is refreshing after 5 games taking place either in black mesa, city 17 or a beach. It's my favorite so it's gotta be 9/10.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two

Второй эпизод заканчивает Half-Life 2, но не серию. Продолжение будет, но когда знает один только [S]бог[/S] Гейб.
Из нововведений стоит выделить Dodge Charger, который несет вас словно пуля, несколько интересных видов врагов: Охотник, Рабочий муравьиный лев, Страж гнезда муравьиных львов, а также личинки, но они безобидны. также появился новый вид мин, но они встретятся вам только в конце игры.
Если говорить о графике, то заметно улучшили освещение и затенение.
Также игра стала более обширной, в плане открытых территорий.
